summary: SQL code templates in VIM Menu
name: Menu_SQL_Templates.vim
description:
This is a simple script, which adds a new menu in GVIM. The menu SQL_Templates will have few sub menus. 

The purpose of the this is to insert SQL code templates in current window/ file.
So you don't have to refer manuals for those SQL commands which you don;t use often.
install_details: Just Put the file in you plugin folder.

versions.release_notes: Re-arranged menus, added few new menus
